Operation 'post_/api/upload_pic' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, unclear_purpose, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Operation has no summary or description, making it impossible for AI agents to understand its purpose. Added clear action verb, domain context about facial recognition, input format expectations, and output details including the image identifier needed for search operations.

data.summary_suggestion: Upload an image for facial recognition search
data.description_suggestion: Uploads an image file to be used for facial recognition searching. The image should contain a face to be recognized. Accepts common image formats (JPEG, PNG, etc.). Returns an image identifier and upload status that can be used in subsequent search operations. The uploaded image is temporarily stored for processing.
data.reasoning: Operation has no summary or description, making it impossible for AI agents to understand its purpose. Added clear action verb, domain context about facial recognition, input format expectations, and output details including the image identifier needed for search operations.

message: Operation 'post_/api/delete_pic' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Summary is clear and actionable, but description is missing. Added details about required parameters (image ID), the relationship to upload operation, side effects (deletion from storage), return value, and use cases to improve AI agent understanding of when and why to use this operation.

data.current_summary: Remove an image from a search request
data.description_suggestion: Removes a previously uploaded image from a search request by image identifier. Requires the image ID returned from the upload operation. Deletes the image from temporary storage and prevents it from being used in further searches. Returns confirmation of successful deletion. This operation is useful for cleaning up failed uploads or changing the search image.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear and actionable, but description is missing. Added details about required parameters (image ID), the relationship to upload operation, side effects (deletion from storage), return value, and use cases to improve AI agent understanding of when and why to use this operation.

message: Operation 'post_/api/info' has semantic quality issues: missing_description, missing_input_details, missing_context. Summary is comprehensive but description is empty. Added authentication requirements, response schema reference, and context about use cases (quota checking before searches) to help AI agents understand when to call this operation and how to interpret results.

data.current_summary: Returns remaining search credits, search engine online status, and number of indexed faces
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves account and system information including remaining search credits available for the authenticated user, current online status of the facial recognition search engine, and total number of indexed faces in the database. Requires Bearer token authentication. Returns an InfoResponse object with credit balance, engine status, and database statistics. Useful for checking quota before performing searches.
data.reasoning: Summary is comprehensive but description is empty. Added authentication requirements, response schema reference, and context about use cases (quota checking before searches) to help AI agents understand when to call this operation and how to interpret results.

message: Operation 'post_/api/search' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, unclear_purpose, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Operation has no summary or description, making it the core operation but completely undocumented. Added clear action verb, explanation of what the search does, input schema reference, detailed output information including result structure, authentication and credit requirements. This is critical for AI agents to understand the primary purpose of the API.

data.summary_suggestion: Search the internet for matching faces
data.description_suggestion: Performs a facial recognition search across indexed internet sources using an uploaded image. Accepts SearchData object containing the image identifier and search parameters. Searches for faces matching the uploaded image and returns Search_Results containing matching profiles, images, and relevance scores. Results include URLs, metadata, and confidence levels for each match. Requires Bearer token authentication and available search credits.
data.reasoning: Operation has no summary or description, making it the core operation but completely undocumented.
